channel.title: World-Building on By Lantern Light
channel.description: Recent content in World-Building on By Lantern Light

item.title: Factions in the Twelve Duchies
item.description: Lore is important in a D&D setting. It helps set the scene, gives context and helps the GM develop the story. [Sly Flourish] wrote an article a while ago about [factions in your campaign].
